snippet: Michael Dunn, the Florida man charged with first-degree murder in the shooting death of Jordan Davis, has said he shot Mr. Davis because he saw a shotgun, a claim the prosecution has denied.
abstract: Prosecutors hammer away at the self-defense claim made by Michael Dunn, Florida man accused of shooting teenager Jordan Davis after a dispute over loud music; prosecution disputes Dunn's claim that he saw a shotgun.
lead_paragraph: Michael Dunn, the Florida man charged with first-degree murder in the shooting death of Jordan Davis, has said he shot Mr. Davis because he saw a shotgun, a claim the prosecution has denied.

headline.main: Weapon in Slaying of Florida Teenager Figures Again in Court
headline.print_headline: Weapon in Slaying of Florida Teenager Figures Again in Court
